pages.name: Entry Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/chuta_rider_core_id)Kamen Rider Chuta Core ID$(/l)

pages.title: GM Rider
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver_gm)Desire Driver (GM)$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Speed

pages.name: Monster Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/monster_raise_buckle)Monster Buckle$(/l) (use in your off-hand to switch sides)

pages.title: GM Rider
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver_gm)Desire Driver (GM)$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Desire Driver user apart from $(l:geats/riders/xgeats)XGeats$(/l) and $(l:geats/riders/dooms_geats)Dooms Geats$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Speed$(br2)Monster Buckle Effects:$(li)Punch V$(li)Strength VIII (with empty hand)$(li)Resistance II

pages.name: Armed Arrow
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/arrow_raise_buckle)Arrow Buckle$(/l) (use in your off-hand to switch sides)

pages.title: GM Rider
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver_gm)Desire Driver (GM)$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Desire Driver user apart from $(l:geats/riders/xgeats)XGeats$(/l) and $(l:geats/riders/dooms_geats)Dooms Geats$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Speed$(br2)Arrow Buckle Effects:$(li)Explosive Shot

pages.name: Armed Drill
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/drill_raise_buckle)Drill Buckle$(/l) (use in your off-hand to switch sides)

pages.title: GM Rider

pages.name: Armed Propeller
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/propeller_raise_buckle)Propeller Buckle$(/l) (use in your off-hand to switch sides)

pages.title: GM Rider
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver_gm)Desire Driver (GM)$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Desire Driver user apart from $(l:geats/riders/xgeats)XGeats$(/l) and $(l:geats/riders/dooms_geats)Dooms Geats$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Speed$(br2)Propeller Buckle Effects:$(li)Slow Falling VII$(li)Jump Boost VII
